dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmMM/DD/YY') run_date, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmHH:MI PM') run_time FROM DUAL

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:OP_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YY') op_s_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:OP_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YY') op_e_date, :P_IMPORT_EXPORT import_export, LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',') loc_num FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT /*+ ALL_ROWS */ TRIM(con1.first_name || ' ' || con1.last_name) ops_manager1, j.job_xid house_bill_lading1, loc2.location_xid account_no1, c1.contact_xid carrier1, j.attribute5 master_bill_lading1, cv.departure_date s_date1, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') open_date1, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') sail_date1, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') arrival_date1, 'Yes' missing_ar1 FROM job j INNER JOIN job_status jstat ON j.job_gid = jstat.job_gid AND jstat.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_BILLED' AND NOT jstat.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_BILL_APPROVED' INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid ='TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid='VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary='Y' AND s.perspective='B' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON con2.location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact c1 ON cv.servprov_gid = c1.contact_gid WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND j.move_perspective_gid = 'IMPORT' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND ((CASE WHEN NOT j.attribute_date4 IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(j.attribute_date4,'dd-mm-rr') ELSE CASE WHEN NOT j.attribute_date3 IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(j.attribute_date3,'dd-mm-rr') ELSE NVL(TO_DATE(cv.actual_arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'),TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr')) END END) >= TO_DATE(:OP_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (CASE WHEN NOT j.attribute_date4 IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(j.attribute_date4,'dd-mm-rr') ELSE CASE WHEN NOT j.attribute_date3 IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(j.attribute_date3,'dd-mm-rr') ELSE NVL(TO_DATE(cv.actual_arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'),TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr')) END END) <= TO_DATE(:OP_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt)))

SELECT DISTINCT /*+ ALL_ROWS */ TRIM(con1.first_name || ' ' || con1.last_name) ops_manager2, j.job_xid house_bill_lading2, loc2.location_xid account_no2, c1.contact_xid carrier2, j.attribute5 master_bill_lading2, cv.departure_date s_date2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') open_date2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') sail_date2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') arrival_date2, 'Yes' missing_ar2 FROM job j INNER JOIN job_status jstat ON j.job_gid = jstat.job_gid AND jstat.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_BILLED' AND NOT jstat.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_BILL_APPROVED' INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid ='TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid='VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary='Y' AND s.perspective='B' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON con2.location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact c1 ON cv.servprov_gid = c1.contact_gid WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND j.move_perspective_gid = 'IMPORT' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (((TO_DATE(NVL(cv.actual_arrival_date,cv.arrival_date),'dd-mm-rr')) >= TO_DATE(:OP_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(NVL(cv.actual_arrival_date,cv.arrival_date),'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:OP_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND j.attribute_date3 > TO_DATE(:OP_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt)))
